greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: In the sequence of natural numbers, replace the nonsquarefree numbers with their minimal factorization into squarefree numbers.
comment: a(A129132(n-1) + 2) = A007947(n) for n > 1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 30 2007
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = f(n,1,2,2,1) with f(n,m,x,y,z) = if n=m then z else if rad(y)=y then f(n,m+1,x+1,x+1,y) else f(n,m+1,x,y/rad(y),rad(y)), rad = squarefree kernel (A007947).
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 18 2007
